anya-e1215n:23: Savaṇā lapanā ceva satiyā cāpi vandanā,
anya-e1215n:29: Yo lokatilako nātho pūretvā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:32: Ārādhito surādīhi kālo mārisa te ayaṁ,
anya-e1215n:35: Etadatthāya te vīra pūritā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:36: Bāhuṁ pitussa putto’va loko ālambate tuvaṁ;
anya-e1215n:38: Tesaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā mahāsatto mahāmatī,
anya-e1215n:50: Janānaṁ nīlanettehi vadanehi tu yā purī,
anya-e1215n:98: Nivedetvā tamatthaṁ sā rañño tena susajjite,
anya-e1215n:113: Brahmāno lokapālā ca manussā kamato tadā,
anya-e1215n:116: Mahiṁ patiṭṭhito dhīro passitvāna tato disā,
anya-e1215n:128: Dibbehi rūpasaddehi gandhehi ca rasehi ca,
anya-e1215n:135: Dassetvā’sesasippaṁ taṁ loke vijjati yaṁ tadā;
anya-e1215n:137: Ñātisaṅghaṁ pamodento deve ca manuje’pi ca,
anya-e1215n:165: Sasī’va dassanīyo ca sūriyo viya tejavā;
anya-e1215n:201: Vajjanti bheriyo tāsu paggayha kāci nāriyo;
anya-e1215n:204: Dhamanti susiraṁ kāci kāci vādenti tantiyo;
anya-e1215n:212: Disvāna so tamacchariyaṁ viratto visaye tadā,
anya-e1215n:219: Iccevaṁ cintayanto so supantova sayī tahiṁ;
anya-e1215n:222: So’yaṁ’dāni supī’ amhe kassadāni karoma taṁ?;
anya-e1215n:224: Iti cintiya te tattha turiyesu sake sake,
anya-e1215n:227: Khādanti kāci dantāni kāci lālā vahantiyo,
anya-e1215n:230: Kākacchanti’pi semhampi gilanti ca camanti ca,
anya-e1215n:231: Karonti nādaṁ nāsāya gharū’ti ca khipanti ca;
anya-e1215n:233: Muttayanti tadā kāci rahassaṁ vicaranti ca,
anya-e1215n:234: Duggandhaṁ vāti taṁ ṭhānaṁ susānaṁ āmakaṁ yathā;
anya-e1215n:237: Addakkhi tāsaṁ nekāni vikārāni tahiṁ tadā;
anya-e1215n:252: Buddho hutvāpi’maṁ sakkā passituṁ iti cintiya;
anya-e1215n:254: Gato nātho tato ṭhānā bodhiyā baddhamānaso
anya-e1215n:255: Tadahevāsi buddhoti kāmuko ko na cintaye;
anya-e1215n:279: Pasatto tattha turago dukkhato agamī tadā;
anya-e1215n:284: Tīraṭṭho passi so dhīro gaṅgānāriṁ rasāvahaṁ,
anya-e1215n:290: Pabbajituṁ mayettheva yuttaṁ no me papañcituṁ,
anya-e1215n:297: Tiṭṭhatu gagane gantvā iti ukkhipi ca’mbaraṁ;
anya-e1215n:302: Kāretvā maṇithūpaṁ so nīdhetvā taṁ siroruhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:308: Pubbe viyambaraṁ gayha ambare khipi nāyako,
anya-e1215n:309: Paṭiggahetvā taṁ brahmā netvā brahmapuraṁ caraṁ;
anya-e1215n:317: Tato ambavanaṁ gantvā vindanto pītijaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:327: Disvā evaṁ vicintesuṁ nāyaṁ yo so janādhipo;
anya-e1215n:332: Sutvāna taṁ tadā keci hasantā vacanantaraṁ,
anya-e1215n:333: Nāyaṁ sasī sasaṅekā so bhānumeso’ti no mati;
anya-e1215n:338: Kiṁ bho ummattakā attha evaṁ mā vadathā’dhunā,
anya-e1215n:339: Sataraṁsī uṇharaṁsī na so eso aviggaho;
anya-e1215n:342: Sarūpena na no atthi saṁsayo balu mānase;
anya-e1215n:344: Tesaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā hasantā keci jantuno,
anya-e1215n:345: Tumhe khalū na jānātha sabāṇe sadhanū hi so;
anya-e1215n:348: Kelāso iti sampatto jahātha vimatiṁ idha;
anya-e1215n:350: Tesampi vacanaṁ sutvā hasanteke janā tadā,
anya-e1215n:351: Nāyaṁ haro tinetto so kesaveso idhāgato;
anya-e1215n:354: Vesenaññena maññāma ettha no natthi saṁsayo;
anya-e1215n:356: Paharitvā karaṁ keci sutvā taṁ vacanaṁ narā,
anya-e1215n:357: Hasantevaṁ tadāvocuṁ vāsudevo na ve ayaṁ;
anya-e1215n:363: Passitunti paṭiññāto mā bhonto vilapantu ve;
anya-e1215n:365: Sutvā tesaṁ giraṁ keci keḷiṁ katvāna nekadhā,
anya-e1215n:366: Tumhe sakkaṁ na jānātha so hi bho vajirāyudho;
anya-e1215n:368: Eso hi bho mahābrahmā brahmalokā idhāgato,
anya-e1215n:369: Pamattā kinnu vedamhī brahmabandhu pure idha;
anya-e1215n:372: Nete candādayo kāmaṁ mā mohaṁ bho pakāsatha;
anya-e1215n:380: Evaṁ vadantā sabbe te nāgarā purisuttamaṁ,
anya-e1215n:384: Jantavo mananāvāyo pāraṁ passiṁsu no tadā;
anya-e1215n:395: Amataṁ viya taṁ bhutvā vikkhāletvā mukhaṁ dakā,
anya-e1215n:396: Patte vattaṁ caritvāna muhuttaṁ tattha vissami;
anya-e1215n:408: Pakāsetvāna lokassa mokkhaṁ natthiti tena so;
anya-e1215n:416: Tadā senāni nigame sujātā khīra dāyikā,
anya-e1215n:422: Yathā mayhaṁ mahādeva iddhā patthita patthanā,
anya-e1215n:425: Iti vatvāna vanditvā katvā ca naṁ padakkhiṇaṁ,
anya-e1215n:435: Disvāna supine pañca atthaṁ tesaṁ vicintiya;
anya-e1215n:447: Tato mahiṁ dvidhā katvā samuṭṭhāsi mahāsanaṁ;
anya-e1215n:452: Kāmaṁ taco nahārū ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
anya-e1215n:455: Na uṭṭhahāmabujjhitvā na jahe vīriyaṁ mama,
anya-e1215n:516: Nāgatā neva vāhesuṁ sabbe etthe’va osaṭā;
anya-e1215n:519: Nāgādayo na dhutāsuṁ ketunaṁ bahu kā kathā;
anya-e1215n:522: Tārakā gagane brūmo kinnu tattha dhajālutā;
anya-e1215n:540: Nosīnā dharaṇī bhārā disebhānaṁ balaṁ aho;
anya-e1215n:560: Kañcanādāsahatthā ca kācī kaññā tathā ṭhitā,
anya-e1215n:563: Kāci maṅgala saṁyutta vacanā tava patthanā,
anya-e1215n:569: Naccanti keci kīḷanti selenti ca lalanti ca,
anya-e1215n:570: Vādenti keci gāyanti velukkhepaṁ karonti ca;
anya-e1215n:594: Pūjāvisesaṁ taṁ ko hi mukhenekena bhāsatī;
anya-e1215n:597: Dasakaṇṭho’pi taṁ sabbaṁ neva sakkonti bhāsituṁ;
anya-e1215n:602: Tasmintu vāsare māro passitvā bhuvanaṁ idaṁ,
anya-e1215n:605: Sabbe dibbavimānā bho suññā dissanti chaḍḍitā,
anya-e1215n:608: Kimbho māra na jānāsi matto sutto’si ajja kiṁ,
anya-e1215n:612: Bodhimule nisinno si ajja buddho bhavāmīti;
anya-e1215n:617: Kinnu te badhiraṁ sotaṁ kinnu parihāyi locanaṁ,
anya-e1215n:618: Dhajaggā te na dissanti ullolaṁ te na sūyati;
anya-e1215n:620: Tesaṁ taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā antako khalu pāpimā,
anya-e1215n:624: Asāro khalu saṁsāro siddhatthe vibhavaṁ gate;
anya-e1215n:629: Nirālokaṁ tilokaṁ bho asuraṁ vāsaraṁ yathā,
anya-e1215n:638: Māpetha bheravaṁ vaṇṇaṁ bībhacchaṁ duddasaṁ kharaṁ,
anya-e1215n:641: Tassa taṁ vacanaṁ sutvā mārasenā samāgamuṁ,
anya-e1215n:647: Disvāna durato ettaṁ devā māraṁ savāhiniṁ,
anya-e1215n:650: Saṁkhippa khippaṁ sacchattaṁ brahmā dhāvi parammukho,
anya-e1215n:651: Katvāna piṭṭhiyaṁ saṅkhaṁ sakko dhāvi visaṅkito;
anya-e1215n:669: Andhakāraṁ disā āsuṁ dhūmaketu ca ambare;
anya-e1215n:684: Na yuttañhi gajo yāti gajaṁ no yāti kotthukaṁ;
anya-e1215n:686: Netaṁ garu palāpetuṁ kālo iti vicintiya,
anya-e1215n:708: Cāletuṁ neva so sakkhi aṁsumattampi cīvare;
anya-e1215n:714: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:720: Hotu dāni mahoghena pavāhemi imaṁ yatiṁ,
anya-e1215n:736: Mahābhīma nabho bherissanā āsuṁ tahiṁ tahiṁ;
anya-e1215n:751: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:757: Bhavatajja kimetena māraṇe tassa kiṁ garu,
anya-e1215n:760: Iti cintiya so māro māpetvāṅgāra vuṭṭhiyo,
anya-e1215n:782: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:786: Dukkhito dummano hutvā evaṁ cintesi dummati;
anya-e1215n:804: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:820: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:823: Taṁ disvā pāpimā kuddho yaṁ yaṁ tassa karoma’haṁ,
anya-e1215n:824: Taṁ taṁ’dānī na sakkoti kiñci kākumu’pakkamaṁ;
anya-e1215n:836: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:839: Tato disvāna taṁ kaṇho kaṇhasenā purakkhato,
anya-e1215n:840: Saṅkuddho pesayi tattha vassaṁ so sikatāmayaṁ;
anya-e1215n:849: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:855: Iti cintiya māpetvā pesesi palipaṁ ghanaṁ,
anya-e1215n:856: Dhūpāyanto pajjalanto gantvā so nabhasā lahuṁ;
anya-e1215n:865: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:871: Mayhaṁ bhāroti cintetvā māpesi timiraṁ ghanaṁ;
anya-e1215n:874: Gantvāna gaganā so hi patvāna munisantikaṁ;
anya-e1215n:883: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:886: Evaṁ navahi vuṭṭhihi katvā māro mahā bhavaṁ,
anya-e1215n:895: Tatheva so mahiṁ kuddho māro khipati vegavā,
anya-e1215n:898: Tatheva kupito tena khipate so mahambudhiṁ,
anya-e1215n:899: Vilayaṁ jalajā yanti sussate so mahaṇṇavo;
anya-e1215n:908: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:911: Iti kopagginā dittamanaṁ māraṁ tadā jino,
anya-e1215n:914: Evaṁ katvāpi so kuddho aladdhavijayo tadā,
anya-e1215n:923: Athagā saha vācāhi bhiṁsā sā māravāhinī,
anya-e1215n:942: Bhujaṅge ca guṇe keci gāḷhamākaḍḍhayanti ca;
anya-e1215n:957: Gattena rakkhasā hutvā keci dhāvanti kiṅakarā;
anya-e1215n:971: Gilantā keci phaṇino uggirantā tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:972: Sīsa kandhara kaṇṇanta bāhu aṅguli ādisu;
anya-e1215n:981: Lālayantā sakā jivhā khandhe katvāna muggare,
anya-e1215n:993: Yaṁ diṭṭha suta mattena maraṇaṁ citta vibbhamaṁ,
anya-e1215n:994: Yāti loko kathaṁ ko taṁ nissesaṁ bhāsate naro;
anya-e1215n:1011: Sahassabāhuṁ māpetvā chūrikā yaṭṭhi satti ca,
anya-e1215n:1021: Āvahanto bhayaṁ brahma sura siddhādīnaṁ tadā,
anya-e1215n:1030: Akampo so munī evamagge’kāsi nijaṁ balaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1049: Suṇātha bho giraṁ mayhaṁ bhavatajja mahā bhavo;
anya-e1215n:1051: Etha yātha samaggattha na ossakkatha sujjhatha,
anya-e1215n:1054: Ajja gacchati niṭṭhānaṁ so bho pāramitābhaṭā,
anya-e1215n:1057: Atha dānabhaṭo āha apphoṭaṁ diguṇaṁ bhujaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1061: Ubho passe karitvāna saseno dhāvi dappavā;
anya-e1215n:1073: Sosemi mama tejena vadaṁ’gā māra sāgaraṁ;
anya-e1215n:1082: Nisidi tassa tejena nirussāhāsi sā camū;
anya-e1215n:1084: Aho bho vimhayaṁ dāni suṇātha munino mama,
anya-e1215n:1088: Aduṭṭho jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1091: Nirāyudho’va taṁ jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1094: Niccalo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1097: Nisinnova jino jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1100: Nissaddo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1106: Khippaṁ siddhattha he gaccha santakedaṁ mamāsanaṁ;
anya-e1215n:1108: No ce gacchasi te hadayaṁ phālemi nakhasattihi,
anya-e1215n:1111: Passa me mahatiṁ senaṁ passa āyudhasañcayaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1112: Tena taṁ abhimaddāmi tuvaṭaṁ gacchidaṁ mama;
anya-e1215n:1115: Kadā te pūritā māra pallaṅkatthāya pāramī;
anya-e1215n:1117: Kadā adāsi sīsādī dānaṁ sīlaṁ kathaṁ tava,
anya-e1215n:1120: Athā’ha pharuso māro netaṁ garu mune mama,
anya-e1215n:1121: Ayaṁ sā parisā sabbā tassa paccakkhakārakaṁ;
anya-e1215n:1126: Athāha māro samaṇa ahaṁ sakkhi kathāpayiṁ,
anya-e1215n:1127: Tava ko sakkhi yajjatthi kathāpehi lahuṁ mama;
anya-e1215n:1129: Athāha bhagavā tassa gambhīraṁ madhuraṁ giraṁ,
anya-e1215n:1132: Taveva me na santīdha paccakkhatthaṁ sacetanā,
anya-e1215n:1135: Iti vatvāna mārāri sañtdhā jimūta gabbhato,
anya-e1215n:1162: Aṅguliyo mukhe keci pakkhipanti rudanti ca,
anya-e1215n:1163: Keci vandanti yāvanti abhayaṁ sāmi dehi no;
anya-e1215n:1171: Taṅkaṇe uggato āsi satthu kitti jayaddhajo,
anya-e1215n:1178: Niccaṁ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṁ sadā;
anya-e1215n:1184: Devā te nikhilā netvā nānāpūjāvidhiṁ tato,
anya-e1215n:1194: Dhamentā viya saṅkhāni kūjenti madhuraṁ giraṁ;
anya-e1215n:1212: Āsavānaṁ khaye ñāṇā laddhā aggaphalaṁ tadā;
anya-e1215n:1220: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi puna gehaṁ na kāhasi,
anya-e1215n:1221: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṁ visaṅkhitaṁ,
anya-e1215n:1232: Pāpārayo ca vijito sa dadātu santiṁ;
anya-e1215n:1349: Hā tāta hā tāta kimāsi tedaṁ
anya-e1215n:1350: Naṭṭhannu te kiṁ vada patthasī kiṁ,
anya-e1215n:1526: Giriṁ nakhena khaṇatha ayo dantehi khādatha;
anya-e1215n:1823: Tvaṁ ko’si re! Iti paro aparaṁ kharena
anya-e1215n:1842: Muḷhā disañca vidisaṁ na vidiṁsu bhītā,
anya-e1215n:1874: Ogamma tattha puthu patthari camma kaṇḍaṁ;
anya-e1215n:1893: Tasmimpi te pavisituṁ saraṇaṁ na laddhā
anya-e1215n:1919: Lokagga puggala varaṁ dada sāmi dhīsa;
anya-e1215n:1923: Tumhe vinā khaṇalavaṁ vasituṁ na icche
anya-e1215n:1933: Katvā’tha so vara mahaṁ tidivehi saddhi
anya-e1215n:1974: Magge phale ca saraṇe ca patiṭṭhahiṁsu
anya-e1215n:2014: Atha ca duhituyā so dīyamānaṁ dadanto
anya-e1215n:2050: Sumana sumana nāmaṁ passi devaṁ samiddhiṁ;
anya-e1215n:2105: Thuti mukhara mukhā tā sādhu kīḷaṁ akaṁsu;
anya-e1215n:2107: Atha muni uragānaṁ viggahaṁ taṁ sametuṁ
anya-e1215n:2112: Na bho bho saṁsāre khalu bhavati sāraṁ lavampi
anya-e1215n:2113: Visesā taṁ sītaṁ jalita dahane vijjati kadā,
anya-e1215n:2114: Sadā rāgaṁ rogaṁ byadhati janataṁ nekaduritaṁ
anya-e1215n:2117: Sarīro’yaṁ battiṁsa vidha kuṇapo sāra rahito
anya-e1215n:2120: Athevaṁ sante bho varayati bhavaṁ ko nu hi budho;
anya-e1215n:2124: Phaṇī majjāro sā guhaka kapayo bhūya bahuso
anya-e1215n:2127: Pure kāko’lukā atha vanabhavā phandana isā
anya-e1215n:2132: Balaṁ bālānaṁ bho saka saka vadhāyeva bhavati
anya-e1215n:2134: Gajaṁ bālaṁ mattaṁ pavidhi na balaṁ hoti saraṇaṁ
anya-e1215n:2135: Athaṭṭhāne kiṁ bho kurutha vīriyaṁ bhuti hananaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2137: Na dukkhaṁ tesaṁ ye vigata kalahā ekamanasā
anya-e1215n:2138: Atīte bho lāpā aghaṭita mānā peyyavacanā,
anya-e1215n:2139: Sukhaṁ vāsaṁ’kāsuṁ yadahani bhavuṁ te’tha vidhurā
anya-e1215n:2144: Atha muditamanā te pīṇitā tassa nāgā
anya-e1215n:2148: Taruṇa raviva tasmiṁ āsane āsi bhāsaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2162: Yadi sugata! Imaṁ tvaṁ nāgato assa ṭhānaṁ
anya-e1215n:2165: Pasami dahana dittaṁ ambudeneva taṁ tvaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2173: Yadi manasi dayā te hoti dāse punā’pi,
anya-e1215n:2180: Sa sumana taru rājaṁ pūjanatthaṁ vidhāya;
anya-e1215n:2185: Dadati iti ca vatvā ovaditvāna satthā;
anya-e1215n:2293: Yo neka kappa sata sañcita puññarāsi
anya-e1215n:2296: Ko tattha bhuti matulaṁ kathiko katheti;
anya-e1215n:2315: Ñatvā taṁ sumano nāgo lahumāgamma sīhalaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2321: Datvā tulādayo sesa mandiraṅge tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:2328: Soṇṇa kiṅkiṇi mālāyo kaṇṇamālā ca māpiya;
anya-e1215n:2351: Sañcinitvāna te nāgā khajja bhojja phalāphale,
anya-e1215n:2354: Tato kāruṇiko nātho bodhito aṭṭhame same,
anya-e1215n:2387: Sāsanodaya selagge sūriyo viya bhāti yo,
anya-e1215n:2391: Pākaṭo bhuvane so’pi gato sambuddha santikaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2441: Tato sambuddha dehasmā nikkhantāsuṁ cha raṁsiyo,
anya-e1215n:2466: Uggantvā parato yantī nīra nijjhara sannībhā;
anya-e1215n:2469: Kārayantā sakaṁ vaṇṇaṁ dhāvantā’pi ca sindhavo;
anya-e1215n:2490: Yāti kiṁ buhmalokannu amhākaṁ bhavanannu kho;
anya-e1215n:2499: Yāvamānā jinaṁ keci tiṭṭhanti ca mahanti ca;
anya-e1215n:2513: Yesaṁ yesaṁ manasmiṁ yaṁ yamatthi kiñci saṁsayaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2514: Tesaṁ taṁ taṁ paṇudento desanāya sudhāsinaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2520: Paṭimaggaṁ karontā te tattha tattha mahāmahaṁ;
anya-e1215n:2525: Ye passanti jinaṁ tattha sasissaṁ siriyā jalaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2528: Ye suṇanti tadā dhammaṁ dhammissara pabhāvitaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2529: Suladdhā tehi sotāni tesaṁ sotāni sotakā;
anya-e1215n:2532: Suladdhā tehi ve jivhā tesaṁ jivhā rasaññakā
anya-e1215n:2534: Ye vandanti jinaṁ yantaṁ sasaṅghaṁ gaganaṅgane,
anya-e1215n:2535: Suladdhā tehi hatthāni tesaṁyeva bhujā bhujā;
anya-e1215n:2537: Tadā tathāgataṁ disvā ye santuṭṭhā tathāgataṁ,
anya-e1215n:2538: Tathāgatānaṁ sabbesaṁ yo toso hotu sabbadā;
anya-e1215n:2543: Tato gaṅgā manuññañhi sampattaṁ taṁ saputtakaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2549: Tato so yācito satthā nāgasaṅghehi vandiya,
anya-e1215n:2555: Tato bhikkhu nisīdiṁsu patta pattāsane tadā,
anya-e1215n:2562: Nettinda maṇināvāhi pāraṁ gantuṁ na te pabhu;
anya-e1215n:2564: Tato sasaṅghaṁ sugataṁ sajano maṇi akkhiko,
anya-e1215n:2578: Maggā janā khalu labhanti kadā patiṭṭhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2583: Jātī jarā maraṇa dukkha pariddavā ca
anya-e1215n:2594: Rūpe na rajjatha tato khalu sādhupaññā;
anya-e1215n:2636: Evaṁ saddhammamaggaṁ varamati sugato desayi pannagānaṁ
anya-e1215n:2637: Sutvā te sampahaṭṭhā mahamahamakaruṁ nijjarādīhi saddhiṁ,
anya-e1215n:2638: Tesaṁ ve desanāyaṁ suraviṭapi samā sātthikā tattha jātā
anya-e1215n:2639: So nātho tañca dhammaṁ bhagavati tanayā te ca vo pālayantu
anya-e1215n:2719: Madhuka vaṭa kareri bodhi jambīra bhalli
anya-e1215n:2757: Siddhā ca siddhavanitā hi tahiṁ tahiṁ te
anya-e1215n:2763: Gokaṇṇa salla sasa jambuka sūkarā ca,
anya-e1215n:2773: Cakkavha kīra kurarā kulalā ca kaṅkā,
anya-e1215n:2789: Kāsātha sopi muni tassa vacaṁ paṭicca
anya-e1215n:2802: Gacchante gaganāyanena sugate bhānu’si santo tadā
anya-e1215n:2803: Vāresuṁ sūriyātapañca jaladā siñjiṁsu bhumyā jalaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2804: Mandāmanda sugandha muddha pavano pāpeti sitaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e1215n:2805: Devādi dhaja chatta cāmarakarā pūjenti mānenti ca;
anya-e1215n:3032: Evaṁ so dhammarājā janahitavihito vīta dosārivaggo
anya-e1215n:3034: Taṁ vo saggā’pavaggaṁ dadati munisamaṁ citta matte pasanne
anya-e1215n:3035: Tasmā bho!Bho! Pahaṭṭhā namatha mahatha taṁ sādhu sādhuppasatthaṁ;
anya-e1215n:3040: Tatheva sādhū saṅakappā khippaṁ pappontu pāṇinaṁ;
anya-e1215n:3051: Tassa sisso’si yo vippagāma vaṁseka ketuko
